# Repair Serious Damage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 173

*With a touch, you mold the battered constructâ€™s form to be more like it was on its day of creation.*

This spell functions like *[[Repair Light Damage (Spell)|repair light damage]],* except that you repair 3d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +15) to a construct.
